Summary Note:
The RM first met Gabriela Gisèle Jost at a wine tasting event in Zürich. They discovered a shared passion for fine wines and decided to explore potential business ventures together.
Having worked for over 15 years, Gabriela Gisèle Jost brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Gabriela Gisèle Jost is currently divorced. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
Gabriela completed her secondary education at Lycée cantonal de Porrentruy Jura in 2004.
Gabriela attended University of Lausanne and graduated in 2009.
Occupation History:
Gabriela Gisèle Jost is a 38 year old Senior Associate from Switzerland.
In 2010, Gabriela Gisèle Jost started working as a Associate Attorney at Schellenberg Wittmer Ltd., marking the beginning of her successful career.
She then transitioned to Bär & Karrer AG as a Senior Associate, leveraging her expertise to drive results from 2015 to 2025.
Wealth Summary:
During her work, she focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 150000 CHF.
Her remarkable portfolio comprises 2 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across St. Gallen and Basel, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.

In addition to her career success, she also received an inheritance of 6670000 CHF from her late grandfather, a renowned Private Equity Manager, in 2017.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Gabriela as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
